msg: On the 1.8.x-issue4400 branch merge r1512195 from trunk.

author: olegk
msg: An attempt at finding a work-around for a bizzare issue that affects one unit test when executed by Continuum CI server

author: breser
msg: Add an assert for the working_url in checkout_file().
This member of the struct is allowed to be NULL for non-checked out dirs.
But checkout_file() assumes that it is always true (which it should be).
If this assumption fails at least we'll get an error this way.
